Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam was yet again ineffective as he was dismissed for a duck against Afghanistan.

Mohammad Rizwan, the highest run scorer in the tournament till now has been in good form, and together with Shadab Khan, Iftikhar Ahmed, Khushdil Shah & Asif Ali, Pakistan are looking formidable enough to take on the Lankan side.
Spinner Mohammad Nawaz is currently the highest wicket-taker in Asia Cup 2022 with 8 wickets to his name in 4 matches.
Shadab Khan has picked up 7 wickets in the tournament while Haris Rauf was deadly economical with the ball in the match against Afghanistan.
Kusal Mendis has been the highest run scorer for Sri Lanka in Asia Cup 2022 and the second highest run scorer overall with 155 runs in 4 matches.

The bowlers have also impressed as a unit and despite only one bowler in the top 10 wicket-takers in Asia Cup 2022 so far, the Sri Lankan team has reached the finals and would be looking to give Pakistan a tough fight in both the remaining matches.
